SEARCH
Package it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.dao.research

Class ResearchDAO

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.dao.research.ResearchDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IResearchDAO
public class ResearchDAO extends Object implements IResearchDAO
This class represents a ResearchDAO and implements all the methods declared in IResearchDAO. It encapsulates database interactions, providing a clean and reusable interface for accessing Event data.

    • getFilteredEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> getFilteredEvents(String searchField, ArrayList<String> pr, ArrayList<String> gen) throws SQLException
      Returns all the events that match with the search field and that comply with the filters set. If I haven't set a search field, all the events that match the filters set are returned.
      Specified by:
      getFilteredEvents in interface IResearchDAO
      Parameters:
      searchField - represents the text written in the textField of the ResearchView
      pr - represents the provinceFilters selected by the ResearchView
      gen - represents the genreFilters selected by the ResearchView
      Returns:
      return
      Throws:
      SQLException - It's thrown if the query for creating events or if the query for creating managers fails

    • countWords

      private int countWords(String input)
      This method count the words contained into the artists String from the database in order to find how many artists are in a festival
      Parameters:
      input - represents the string of artists taken as input. It is used for the creation of a festival
      Returns:
      words.lenght

    • createManager

      private Manager createManager(ResultSet resultSet1) throws SQLException
      This method creates a manager by taking its data from the database. This is useful for creating an event later
      Parameters:
      resultSet1 - represents the resultset of manager query
      Returns:
      new Manager()
      Throws:
      SQLException - It's thrown if the manager is not created correctly in the domain

    • createEvent

      private Event createEvent(ResultSet rs, Manager manager) throws SQLException
      This method creates a specific event by taking data from the database and uses the previously created manager as the event creator
      Parameters:
      rs - represents the resultset of event query
      manager - represents the manager created previously into the createManager method
      Returns:
      new Event()
      Throws:
      SQLException - It's thrown if the event is not created correctly in the domain
